column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Went here today for brunch
column2: and it was a little difficult to get to today because of a little construction. From what I could see there was plenty of parking
column3: but I was running late so I did valet. Our server was good
column4: very patient with us because we kept changing our order. We all shared a mimosa carafe
column5: which honestly they weren't that strong. Ordered an order of totchos and Bosscat fries which were pretty delicious. For my entree I ordered the Fruity Pebbles French Toast but couldn't only eat half
column6: because it was way too sweet. I loved the atmosphere of the restaurant
column7: but probably wouldn't come back for brunch.
